name: Golden Dot Connect
description:
Golden Dot Connect is an amazing and addictive puzzle game to bring you happiness every day! And the whole game is completely free! Download for fun!

• Very easy game tutorial, you can learn to play very quickly;
• 1500+ levels, from simple to complex, just play again and again;
• Stuck? Use all kinds of props to easily complete the level;
• Start connect matching colors now!
